info.value: Manjusha is responsible for Nitman’s technology vision and development of the company’s new products. She oversees product management, engineering and services. Manjusha also serves as the Director of Talentica Software, one of the leading OPD companies in India. Prior to founding Talentica, she was the Director in charge of Indian Engineering Team of California based eGain Communications. Manjusha led the development effort for EX-NGN, one of India’s leading accounting software during her stint at Tata Consultancy Services before this. Manjusha holds a Masters degree from Northwestern University and a B.Tech from Indian Institute of Technology.
